commit_message:
Create proteins_align_genome.sh

Uses mmseqs2 to align proteins to a genome. I tend to use orthodb for the same.

Update proteins_cluster.sh

add vars to enable selection of seq-id and seq-coverage

Parallel_polish.sh for pacbio/illumina polishing

PacBio and Illumina reads based polishing of the genome. 
Protip: Always generate the VCFs! Compress the VCF using bgzip after the entire step to save tons of space!

Create split_assembly.py

Use this to split assembled genome for various uses

Create ncRNA_prediction.sh

Relatively faster approach to predict ncRNA in the genome

Create proteins_cluster.sh

Uses mmseqs2 to cluster the proteins sequences. I use this for generating a Non-Redundant protein set to generate alignments using genomethreader or whatever.

Has been generalized enough.

Create mirna_reads_cluster.sh

Nearly generalized for use cases. Need to tweak exit codes.

Create PBJelly_gap_fill

Non-generalized version, will be using this from now on to fill the gaps. Should have a faster run time than normal full-reads runtime with blasr.
